name: Threat Behavior Assessment
description: Assessing behavioral indicators of potential security threats and violent actors.

cards.title: Pre-Attack Indicators & Behavioral Cues
cards.description: Recognizing signs of impending violent or terrorist activity.
bulletpoints: Analyze shifts in routine behaviors and erratic movements
Detect radicalization and extremist ideologies through speech patterns
Assess last-minute changes in financial transactions and communications

cards.title: Workplace & Public Space Threat Assessments
cards.description: Identifying and mitigating threats in civilian and organizational environments.
bulletpoints: Evaluate employee behavioral changes for insider threats
Monitor public spaces for indicators of potential attacks
Coordinate predictive threat modeling with intelligence agencies
